documents.document: RT @jeremycorbyn: Just as 80 years ago #CableStreet stood with the Jewish community against the fascists, today we must stand up to racism…
The battle of #CableStreet is legendary in my family. My grandma was a force to be reckoned with, I'm sure she organised the whole thing.
RT @hopenothate: #OTD 4 October 1936 over 100,000 people forced #blackshirt #fascists to abandon a march through #Jewish #EastEnd #CableStr…
80yrs ago my family and ordinary, local East London people, lined Cable Street to stop the fascist Black shirts passing their neighbourhood.
RT @BBCNews: .@BritishVogue's November issue will feature academics and businesswomen instead of models for first time. https://t.co/fceG7H…
By the way Twitter, now I've finished working on a mammoth job, I'm going to be here a lot more often. Posting shit and gobbing off. FYI
If excellent theatre, a variety of attractive men, and 1970's ercol style furniture are your thing, you should definitely see @BoysBandPlay
Lovely evening on Sunday with @ReetuKabra @KateGroucutt & @_matash consisting of excellent Italian food and excellent theatre @BoysBandPlay
...I quickly got over the sadness of finishing a lovely job, by meeting my loved ones in a pub and excessively drinking. #yay
I've officially finished work! I felt rather emotional when leaving the gates of lovely Shepperton my favourite studios by far! #freelance
RT @DrStrange: The Eye of Agamotto belongs to Earth's Sorcerer Supreme and is a powerful artifact against dark magic. #DoctorStrange https:…

@VenusOctober @ReetuKabra A lot of thought, care and attention went in to it from a talented crew. So pleased it's going down well with fans
Hanging today after an amazing Wrap party for Life last night. https://t.co/DBFyMd7Gd0
@ReetuKabra Ah thanks, lovely! I was the painter for this, just one of a great team of talented folk involved. x

My lovey husband @_matash bought me a present. Now I have the excuse I was looking for to sit on the sofa in my pjs all day, every day. 👍 https://t.co/kdCKnqdCjP
Another lovely job finished yesterday, with the coolest, friendliest crew ever. An emotional end to a tough but rewarding job for everyone. https://t.co/HlE5m9FTDB
Tomorrow is my last day on a busy and challenging but bloody fantastic film job. I will miss this crew! #freelance #Life
@_matash ? https://t.co/PEmUsS2HNl
I stayed late at work for the last 3 nights and worked through my breaks, to respray my kitchen cupboard doors. I think I deserve wine now.

So Ore Oduba's wife and dance partner look identical. Risky business! #scd

The milk in the fridge at my new workplace has bobbly eyes stuck on it. I think I could be happy here. #newjob
Showed my lovely husband my new smock dress. Him: "What is it? I don't understand it. What do you do with it? Do you wear it to paint in?"
RT @BillyBlindBand: HAPPY HALLOWEEN! 🌕 https://t.co/r4Qv5vLyOb

RT @Number10cat: A reminder that the clocks go back an hour tonight in the UK, which feels a bit excessive given that they went back 40 yea…
P themed party tonight. My lovely husband is dressed as a 'sexy Priest'.
How can a domino effect of direct negativity be dealt with? Listening? Ignoring it? Love? Crumbling into self pity? Answers on a postcard...
@Whovian_Callum You can't.
..That last retweet, I was responsible for the finish of the 'before' ultron, and if I do say so myself I think we nailed it. Props to props

We've had the Doctor Strange crew screening...It's amazing! Proud to have been involved and worked with such a talented crew here in the UK.

All I want in life to feel I have made the right decisions. Too many decisions today. Lastly, @_matash which wine shall we drink? x

NOT HAVING TO GO TO BED EARLY TO GET UP FOR WORK AT 5.30AM IS THE BEST. #christmasholiday #morewineplease
Random lady in a café today tried to strike up a conversation about the Queen having a cold -"It's SO sad for her Christmas"...I bit my lip. https://t.co/5mlXw7CY8b

The final wedding of the year for us today. Last of 6! 2016 = The year of love ❤️
Really lovely party last night with some of my favourite people. Bonus points to me for not having a hangover today!
Didn't go to the Assassins Creed crew screening as it was at 10am and I wanted a lie in. 😁 Can't wait to see it though, should be stunning.
I could travel long haul with these bags, under my eyes. 😳
All I wish is for someone to just bloody tell me how to make my eyebrows look good.
